channel.title: Anselmo L. S. Melo's Git Achievements

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 2)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 4)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Socialite (Level 4)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 1)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 5)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 1)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Locksmith (Level 3)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Apprentice Socialite (Level 3)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Author (Level 4)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 2)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 18 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Locksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.
